languages.text: {n}Руолдо чуть наклоняется к вам, обдавая вас парами амасека.{/n} "А то, что вы видите пред собою чуть больше лицемеров, нежели ожидали... это для вашего пущего веселья, Звездное Сиятельство. Больше людей — ярче огонь, как говорила моя матушка. Огонь... праведности, разумеется. Неистовый, ух!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Руолдо чуть наклоняется к вам, обдавая вас парами амасека.{/n} "А то, что вы видите пред собою чуть больше лицемеров, нежели ожидали... это для вашего пущего веселья, Звездное Сиятельство. Больше людей — ярче огонь, как говорила моя матушка. Огонь... праведности, разумеется. Неистовый, ух!"

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo leans toward you slightly, gracing you with the strong smell of amasec.{/n} "And that you see more impostors before you than anticipated — that's just to add to your enjoyment, Your Celestial Highness. A crowd burns brighter, as my mother always used to say. Burns, uh... with righteousness, of course. Fierce righteousness!"

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo lehnt sich zu dir und beglückt dich mit einer starken Amasecfahne.{/n} "Und dass Ihr noch mehr Hochstapler als erwartet vor Euch seht ... auch das dient Eurer Unterhaltung, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Eine Menge brennt heller, wie meine Mutter stets zu sagen pflegte. Sie brennt natürlich, ähm ... vor Rechtschaffenheit. Feuriger Rechtschaffenheit!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo leans toward you slightly, gracing you with the strong smell of amasec.{/n} "And that you see more impostors before you than anticipated — that's just to add to your enjoyment, Your Celestial Highness. A crowd burns brighter, as my mother always used to say. Burns, uh... with righteousness, of course. Fierce righteousness!"

Eine Menge brennt heller, wie meine Mutter stets zu sagen pflegte. Sie brennt natürlich, ähm ... vor Rechtschaffenheit. Feuriger Rechtschaffenheit!"

Eure himmlische Hoheit. Eine Menge brennt heller, wie meine Mutter stets zu sagen pflegte. Sie brennt natürlich, ähm ... vor Rechtschaffenheit. Feuriger Rechtschaffenheit!"

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo se penche légèrement vers vous, suffisamment près pour que vous sentiez la forte odeur d'amasec de son haleine.{/n} « Et ne vous étonnez pas de voir davantage d'imposteurs que prévu devant vous, Votre Altesse Célestissime. C'est simplement pour pimenter un peu votre divertissement. Plus on est de fous, plus vivement on brûle, comme le disait ma mère. Euh, on brûle... de ferveur, évidemment. D'une ferveur ardente ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo leans toward you slightly, gracing you with the strong smell of amasec.{/n} "And that you see more impostors before you than anticipated — that's just to add to your enjoyment, Your Celestial Highness. A crowd burns brighter, as my mother always used to say. Burns, uh... with righteousness, of course. Fierce righteousness!"

languages.text: {n}罗尔多微微倾过了身子，你闻到了浓烈的艾玛赛克酒味。{/n}“不仅如此，出现在您面前的冒牌货，会比您预期的还要多。这会为您的狩猎带来额外的乐趣，来自上界的大人。就像我母亲常说的那样，众人当柴火焰高……呃，我是说，拾柴！没错，众人拾柴，点燃正义的烈焰！”
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo leans toward you slightly, gracing you with the strong smell of amasec.{/n} "And that you see more impostors before you than anticipated — that's just to add to your enjoyment, Your Celestial Highness. A crowd burns brighter, as my mother always used to say. Burns, uh... with righteousness, of course. Fierce righteousness!"

traits.locale_text: {n}罗尔多微微倾过了身子，你闻到了浓烈的艾玛赛克酒味。{/n}“不仅如此，出现在您面前的冒牌货，会比您预期的还要多。这会为您的狩猎带来额外的乐趣，来自上界的大人。就像我母亲常说的那样，众人当柴火焰高……呃，我是说，拾柴！没错，众人拾柴，点燃正义的烈焰！”
{n}罗尔多微微倾过了身子，你闻到了浓烈的艾玛赛克酒味。{/n}“不仅如此，出现在您面前的冒牌货，会比您预期得还要多。这会为这场狩猎带来额外的乐趣，来自上界的大人。就像我母亲常说的那样，众人当柴火焰高……呃，我是说，拾柴！没错，众人拾柴，点燃正义的烈焰！”

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo se inclina ligeramente hacia ti, deleitándote con el olor a amasec de su aliento.{/n} «Y el hecho de que haya más impostores de lo esperado... solo añade emoción al asunto, su Excelencia Celestial. Las muchedumbres arden mejor, como decía mi madre. Arden... con justicia, claro. ¡Una ardiente justicia!».
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo leans toward you slightly, gracing you with the strong smell of amasec.{/n} "And that you see more impostors before you than anticipated — that's just to add to your enjoyment, Your Celestial Highness. A crowd burns brighter, as my mother always used to say. Burns, uh... with righteousness, of course. Fierce righteousness!"

Las muchedumbres arden mejor, como decía mi madre. Arden... con justicia, claro. ¡Una ardiente justicia!».

Las muchedumbres arden mejor, como decía mi madre. Arden... con justicia, claro. ¡Una ardiente justicia!».

languages.text: {n}ルオルドはわずかにあなたの方に身を乗り出し、強烈なアマセックの匂いを漂わせる。{/n}「そして、予想以上に多くの偽者を目にすることになるでしょうが、それもまた、あなたの楽しみのための特別なスパイスです、天の閣下。母がいつも言っていたように、群衆は明るく燃える。燃え上がる…もちろん、正義の炎で。熱狂的な正義の炎で！」
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo leans toward you slightly, gracing you with the strong smell of amasec.{/n} "And that you see more impostors before you than anticipated — that's just to add to your enjoyment, Your Celestial Highness. A crowd burns brighter, as my mother always used to say. Burns, uh... with righteousness, of course. Fierce righteousness!"

languages.text: {n}Ruoldo, hafifçe sana doğru eğilip burnunun kuvvetli amasek kokusundan kırılmasını sağlıyor.{/n} "Önünüzde beklenenden daha fazla taklitçi görmeniz, alacağınız keyfi katlayacaktır Semavi Efendimiz. Annem her zaman 'Sayı çoğaldıkça ateş daha güzel yanar.' derdi. Daha doğrulukla yanar bir de. Şiddetli bir doğrulukla!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ruoldo leans toward you slightly, gracing you with the strong smell of amasec.{/n} "And that you see more impostors before you than anticipated — that's just to add to your enjoyment, Your Celestial Highness. A crowd burns brighter, as my mother always used to say. Burns, uh... with righteousness, of course. Fierce righteousness!"
